awd_titl_txt: University of Pittsburgh - Research Experiences in          Chemistry for Undergraduates
awd_abstract_narration: This Research Experiences for Undergraduates (REU) Site project is              in analytical, inorganic, organic, and physical chemistry.  For a               three-year period beginning in April, 1989, eight (8)                           undergraduate students will spend ten (10) weeks engaged in basic               research under the direction of eleven (11) faculty members from                the University of Pittsburgh chemistry department.  Unique aspects              of this REU activity are that each participant will become a part               of an existing research team, and the faculty member who heads the              team will become the participant's mentor.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
